title: @Riot, will there be a RP Sale any time soon?
body:
I just want to know if there will be any RP sale soon so that I don't just purchase RP just before a sale comes out.

Thanks.

replies.body:
I haven't seen any announcements for an RP sale, so I'm really not sure. I do know that if one is announced, you'll find it on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/), so keep an eye on that page!

Let me know if you have any questions.

I was just looking through the RP purchases that can be made and apparently I can't just purchase the "right amount" I want. I'm wondering why isn't there a +$5 worth of RP increment purchase system or the sorts.

These are the online transaction increments: $5, $10, $20, **_$35_**, **_$50_**, $100. 
Notice the difference in the increments in the middle. As I've heard, there is a $25 gift card you can purchase from various stores. But the point here is to buy the "right amount" that you want without having to go through the way of going to a store for just a $25 gift card or making multiple purchases while losing out on the extra RP. 

(Purchasing a $25 RP gift card = 3500 RP. Purchasing a $5 (650 RP) and $20 (2800 RP) from the client's Store = 3450. 3500-3450 = 50 extra RP loss, yes this is just measly amount. Again, the point is to purchase just the "right amount" you want from the client's Store.)

I don't work on the store team, so I don't have an answer for you as to why you can't purchase RP in other increments. :/

If have any other questions, though, please let me know.
